name: Hydreigon
description: This brutal Pokémon travels the skies on its six wings. Anything that moves seems like a foe to it, triggering its attack.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap.  This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball.  This ability is not disabled during roost.
